channel.title: Conference on Mariatta
channel.description: Recent content in Conference on Mariatta

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ North Bay Python 2023
item.description: Angela’s Organic Ice Cream Petaluma After giving my talk at North Bay Python in July 2023, I went to Angela’s Organic Ice Cream in Downtown Petaluma for a Lavender Ice cream. View this post on Instagram A post shared by Mariatta Wijaya (@mariatta81) Here’s where you can find Angela’s Organic Ice Cream:

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2023
item.description: PyCon US 2023 was really special 😊 I get to do Ice cream selfies with various people! Rockwell Ice Cream With Ned Batchelder (photo taken by Ned Batchelder, from his blog post here. We went to Rockwell Ice Cream. We ran into Drazen Lucic while at Rockwell Ice Cream. Capo Gelateria Italiana With Georgi Ker, Cheuk-Ting Ho, and Zac Hatfield-Dodds at Capo Gelateria Italiana. Never too late to post our #icecreamselfie with @mariatta @cheukting_ho and Zac to get 1 point @pycon US.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ Python Brasil 2022
item.description: Del Monte Gelateria I found Del Monte Gelateria inside Manaura shopping mall, which was walking distance from the hotel I was staying. I had trouble choosing a flavor because everything looks so good! Most people don’t speak english very well, but I was able to order what I want by pointing at the display 😝 View this post on Instagram A post shared by Mariatta Wijaya (@mariatta81)

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon Colombia 2022
item.description: Cows Ice Cream Whistler I gave a keynote speech at PyCon Colombia. It was an online event, so I didn’t actually get to have ice cream in Colombia. Perhaps one day. While on a camping trip to Whistler, I decided to get my Ice Cream Selfie at Cows Ice cream, which is a favorite place for us. Each time we’re there, there’s always a long lineup. 🍦😝🤳 #IceCreamSelfie for @pyconcolombia #PyConColombia2022

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon APAC 2021
item.description: Bella Gelateria I gave a keynote speech at PyCon APAC 2021, which was hosted by PyCon Thailand. This was an online event, so I didn’t actually go to Thailand for this. However, I found an ice cream flavour that represent Thailand: Thai Coconut Milk Gelato from Bella Gelateria! Bella Gelateria has one of the best ice cream in Vancouver, they’ve won many awards! Belated #IceCreamSelfie for @pyconapac @pyconthailand 🇹🇭🐍 🍦😝🤳

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ GitHub Global Maintainer Summit
item.description: Snowy Village I gave a talk about The Bots of CPython at GitHub Global Maintainer Summit. It was an online event, so I looked for local ice cream shops where I live. Snowy Village is my kids favorite place here. They really love the bingsu, which is milk-based Korean shaved ice dessert. Bingsu counts as ice cream! #IceCreamSelfie 🍦😝🤳 @ Snowy Village pic.twitter.com/ZKqlTZkZUK — Mariatta 🤦 (@mariatta) June 17, 2021

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon US 2021
item.description: Vashti Rose In-House Made Ice Cream If you ever come to Port Moody, you must make a stop at Vashti Rose In-House Made Ice Cream. All of their ice creams are made from scratch locally, and they have vegan options too. 🍦😝🤳 The time has come for #IceCreamSelfie #PyCon #PyConUS #PyConUS2021 Whiskey Hazelnut and Chocolate Brownie Ice Cream @ Vashti Rose Ice Cream pic.twitter.com/eUmMbIKECH — Mariatta 🤦 (@mariatta) May 15, 2021

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon Belarus 2021
item.description: Matteo’s Gelato I went to Matteo’s Gelato in Port Coquitlam for this one, after first taking a stroll along Coquitlam River @ Lions Park. Crème brûlée and chocolate hazelnut gelato from Matteo's Gelato in Port Coquitlam. My reward for giving @pyconby closing keynote. 🍦😝🤳 #IceCreamSelfie pic.twitter.com/i3zume2skU — Mariatta 🤦 (@mariatta) March 14, 2021

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCascades 2021
item.description: At PyCascades 2021, I was on a panel with Guido van Rossum, Carol Willing, Brett Cannon, and Nina Zakharenko, so after that was done, I asked them to do an ice cream selfie with me. I’m glad they all obliged! 😊 I had the Nestle DRUMSTICK Sundae Cone. A very special virtual #IceCreamSelfie with @WillingCarol @brettsky @nnja @gvanrossum #pycascades 🍦😝🤳 pic.twitter.com/MXUn0E3jRq — Mariatta 🤦 (@mariatta) February 20, 2021

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ SeaGL, PyCon Indonesia, PyCon Poland
item.description: It was 2020. I joined so many virtual conferences, and at one point, I was a speaker at three different conferences all in one same weekend. 2020 was also, a challenging time, I didn’t get to go out a lot. I didn’t even get to do my Ice cream selfie after the conference. Finally, on new year’s eve, we decided to celebrate and go out. While in Robson Street, we stopped by a Korean grocery store and my kids saw some boba milk tea ice cream bar for sale.

item.title: Ice Cream Selfie @ PyCon Australia, and PyCon Taiwan
item.description: Rocky Point Ice Cream 2020, the year of virtual conferences for me. I get to speak at two different conferences happening in the same weekend: PyCon Australia, and PyCon Taiwan. I decided to just get two scoops of ice cream from one shop. This is from Rocky Point Ice Cream. Thanks @pyconau and @PyConTW for having me! I gave talk at two conferences in the same weekend so I think I deserve the two scoops of ice cream from @RPIceCream (I picked matcha green tea and espresso flakes flavours)#IceCreamSelfie 🍦😝🤳 pic.
